game.name: Holy Nope!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A small incremental game about defending Heaven from hordes of sinners who think they deserve a spot in Paradise. Sure, people have a high opinion of themselves, but Heaven is full - and you are the bouncer.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A small incremental game about defending Heaven from hordes of sinners who think they deserve a spot in Paradise. Sure, people have a high opinion of themselves, but Heaven is full - and you are the bouncer.
